metadata.title: CVE-2019-9026 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.13. There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the function InflateVarName() in inflate.c when called from ReadNextCell in mat5.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.13-3
matio-tools - 1.5.13-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.13-3').
